Text: Equities research analysts expect Ventas to earn $3.93 per share next year, which means the company should continue to be able to cover its $3.17 annual dividend with an expected future payout ratio of 80.7%.
Cause: Equities research analysts expect Ventas to earn $3.93 per share next year
Effect: the company should continue to be able to cover its $3.17 annual dividend with an expected future payout ratio of 80.7%.
Sentence: <e1>Equities research analysts expect Ventas to earn $3.93 per share next year</e1>, which means <e2>the company should continue to be able to cover its $3.17 annual dividend with an expected future payout ratio of 80.7%.</e2>
